page.title: 15OUR BUS SERVICES
page.content: OUR BUS SERVICE _______________ As we live in a rural area we have to travel into town a lot to do our shopping or go to the pictures.This means using the bus a lot,especially if you do not have a car.The buses run once every two hours with more buses laid on during the weekend.The reason for a small number of buses is that a lot of people own their own cars and therefore do not depend o n the buses.I would use my bike a lot more if there were not so many hills to push my bike up.There used to be a train service from Bangor but they pulled the track up about 30 years ago.There was also a narrow gauge line running from the Penrhyn slate quarry to the quay at Port Penrhyn near Bangor but this was also dismantled.
